issue.title: [C++] Installation on IBM i fails because of CxxFlags
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12836](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12836). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Newer versions of ibm i have CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR set to powerpc or powerpc64. Hence in the current release ARROW_CPU_FLAG  defaults to "x86" which makes the install fail.
